Package org.cesecore.keybind

Interface InternalKeyBindingDataSessionLocal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalKeyBindingDataSessionBean
    public interface InternalKeyBindingDataSessionLocal
    Create Read Update Delete (CRUD) interface for InternalKeyBindingData.
    Version:
    $Id: InternalKeyBindingDataSessionLocal.java 25609 2017-03-24 00:00:29Z jeklund $

    • Method Detail

      • getInternalKeyBinding

        InternalKeyBinding getInternalKeyBinding​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        the a cached reference to the specified InternalKeyBinding that MAY NOT be edited. Null if not found.

      • getInternalKeyBindingForEdit

        InternalKeyBinding getInternalKeyBindingForEdit​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        a clone of the specified InternalKeyBinding that can be modified freely. Null if not found.

      • mergeInternalKeyBinding

        int mergeInternalKeyBinding​(InternalKeyBinding internalKeyBinding)
                     throws InternalKeyBindingNameInUseException
        Add the specified InternalKeyBinding to the database and return the id used to store it
        Parameters:
        internalKeyBinding - binding
        Returns:
        merged binding
        Throws:
        InternalKeyBindingNameInUseException - if name in use

      • removeInternalKeyBinding

        boolean removeInternalKeyBinding​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        true if the object existed before removal of the object with the provided id from the database.

      • getIds

        List<Integer> getIds​(String type)
        Parameters:
        type - Type
        Returns:
        a list of all identifiers for the specified type from the database. If the type is null, ids for all types will be returned.

      • getCachedNameToIdMap

        Map<String,​Integer> getCachedNameToIdMap()
        Returns:
        a (copy of a) name to id lookup table

      • flushCache

        void flushCache()
        Clears the InternalKeyBinding cache.

      • isNameUsed

        boolean isNameUsed​(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        Returns:
        true if the specified name is already in use by another InternalKeyBinding (checks the database, not the cache)

      • isNameUsedByIdOnly

        boolean isNameUsedByIdOnly​(String name,
                           int id)
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        id - ID
        Returns:
        true if the specified name is used by exactly one InternalKeyBinding and that object has the same id (checks the database, not the cache)

      • readData

        InternalKeyBindingData readData​(int id)
        Should only be used internally by other methods. This is an Interface method so that we can specify @TransactionAttribute(TransactionAttributeType.REQUIRED).
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        the a cached reference to the specified InternalKeyBinding that MAY NOT be edited. Null if not found.
